*[[Minix NEO X5]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM4330 (WiFi)/BCM40183 (BT) :[[Rockchip]] RK903 WLAN/BT Combo Module (Bluetooth 4.0) :CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3066 @1.6GHz (Dual Core Cortex-A9) :GPU: Mali-400 MP4 @266MHz (Quad Core) • [https://www.eeboard.com/teardown/minix-neo-x5暴力拆解/ Teardown] :Flash: 2x ''Micron'' or ''SK hynix'' [https://www.eeboard.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/09/MINIX-NEO-X5-14.jpg H27UCG8T2BTR-BC] (16GB NAND) :RAM: 4x ''Micron'' MT41J256M8HX-15E:D [http://www.puris.net/micronlist D9LGK] (1GB DDR3) <!-- 256X8DDR3 - D9LGK, FBGA 9x11.5-78, 2Gb: x8 DDR3 --> *[https://www.eeboard.com/teardown/minix-neo-x5暴力拆解/ ''Minix NEO X5'' Teardown on '''EEboard''']
===See also=== *[[Minix NEO G4]] - [[Realtek]] RTL8188EUS • [http://www.minix.us/products/neog4.html PPage] *[[Minix NEO X5]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM4330 • [http://www.minix.us/products/neox5.html PPage] • [https://www.eeboard.com/teardown/minix-neo-x5暴力拆解/ Teardown] *[[Minix NEO X7]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM4330 • [http://www.minix.us/products/neox7.html PPage] • [https://4minipc.ru/razborka/61-razborka-minix-neo-x7-foto.html Teardown] <!-- :CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3188 Quad-Core @1.6GHz (ARM Cortex-A9) :Flash: 16GB - 2x ''SK hynix'' H27UCG8T2BTR-BC (MLC NAND 8Gb x8) :RAM: 1GB - 2x ''SK hynix'' H5TQ4G63AFRP-BC (DDR3 SDRAM 4Gb) :WLAN: [[AMPAK AP6330]] (BCM4330/BCM40183) (Wi-Fi, BT 4.0) :USB: [[SMSC]] USX2064AEZG - USB 2.0 4-port Hub Controller :LAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8152B - 10/100 Mbps Ethernet Controller :Audio: [[Realtek]] ALC5616 - Ultra-Low Power Audio CODEC :HDMI: ''iTE'' IT66121FN - Low Power Transmitter HDMI 1.4 :PMIC: ''Active'' ACT8846QM - Power Management IC Controller --> *[[Minix NEO X7 mini]] - [[Broadcom]] BCM43362 • [http://www.minix.us/products/neox7mini.html PPage] • [https://4minipc.ru/razborka/63-razborka-minix-neo-x7-mini-foto.html Teardown] <!-- PEB15-15E DDR3 :CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3188 Quad-Core @1.6GHz (ARM Cortex-A9) :Flash: 16GB - 2x ''SK hynix'' H27UCG8T2BTR-BC (MLC NAND 8Gb x8) :RAM: 2GB - 4x ''SpecTek'' PRM256M16V80AG8-GP (DDR3 SDRAM 4Gb) :WLAN: [[AMPAK AP6210]] (BCM43362/BCM20710) (Wi-Fi, BT 4.0) :USB: [[SMSC]] USX2064AEZG - USB 2.0 4-port Hub Controller :LAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8152B - 10/100 Mbps Ethernet Controller :Audio: [[Realtek]] ALC5616 - Ultra-Low Power Audio CODEC :HDMI: ''iTE'' IT66121FN - Low Power Transmitter HDMI 1.4 :PMIC: ''Active'' ACT8846QM - Power Management IC Controller -->
